title: Middle East Crisis: Netanyahu Meets With Biden to Discuss the War in Gaza
content: Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu, a day after addressing Congress, met on Thursday with President Biden at the White House. Both leaders offered polite words at a fraught moment in their relationship with the future of the Middle East on the line.
summary: Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu, a day after addressing Congress, met on Thursday with President Biden at the White House. Both leaders offered polite words at a fraught moment in their relationship with the future of the Middle East on the line.

title: In Burkina Faso, ‘Nowhere Is Safe’ from Terrorists or Troops
content: The West African nation of Burkina Faso was once known for its lively arts scene. Now, it is a country torn apart by Islamist extremists and the government’s brutal effort to drive them out.
